settings.text: Even though all women in the world will go through it, there’s still taboo and lack of knowledge about menopause. Seven out of ten women suffer from menopausal symptoms, but only one out of ten receive treatment. Many suffer in silence from their menopausal problems and we want to change that!

settings.heading: LET'S START FROM THE BEGINNING. WHAT EVEN IS MENOPAUSE?

settings.text:
At DeoDoc, we understand the importance of taking care of your intimate skin. Founded by women doctors for women, our mission is to provide gentle and effective solutions for your intimate skincare needs. In this article, we'll introduce you to 5 ingredients we use in our doctor-developed intimate skincare.

 

1. 100% ORGANIC COTTON (GOSSYPIUM):

100% organic cotton offers several benefits to intimate skin. This organic cotton is hypoallergenic, making it an ideal choice for those with sensitive skin. Moreover, as it's free from chemical pesticides, organic cotton promotes a healthier environment by avoiding the harmful impacts associated with conventional cotton farming.

By choosing organic cotton products, you're not only caring for your well-being but also contributing to a more sustainable future. Additionally, the breathability of organic cotton ensures you stay dry and comfortable, minimizing discomfort, and the risk of fungal growth and chafing.
Find it in: Pads, Tampons & Liners

2. SWEET ALMOND OIL (PRUNUS AMYGDALUS DULCIS OIL)

Sweet Almond oil provides a range of specific benefits for intimate skin care. Its rich composition of antioxidants, vitamins, and essential nutrients makes it a perfect match for intimate skin. This natural emollient not only deeply moisturizes but also works to soften the skin, making it an invaluable hydrating agent.

When it comes to intimate skin, Sweet Almond oil's anti-inflammatory properties take on special significance. Research has shown promising results in using Sweet Almond oil to prevent and alleviate stretch marks, which are common during pregnancy and can lead to itching and discomfort. Moreover, Sweet Almond oil's high fatty acid content not only helps in smoothing the skin but also enhances its moisture retention and elasticity.
Find it in: Calming Oil & Cleansing Oil

3. AVOCADO OIL (PERSEA GRATISSIMA OIL)

Avocado oil, extracted from the fruit's flesh, serves as a versatile agent for overall skin health. Avocado oil's rich nutritional profile, including healthy fats and fat-soluble vitamins like D, K, A, and E, contributes to overall skin health. The presence of antioxidants like lutein and zeaxanthin further enhances its protective and rejuvenating qualities.

Avocado oil acts as a potent shield against the harmful effects of ultraviolet radiation, offering a layer of defense against premature aging and skin damage caused by sun exposure. This oil also excels at calming itchy skin, making it a soothing remedy for general skin discomfort. It's also a potent healer of chapped and dry skin, replenishing lost moisture and hydration.
Find it in: Cleansing Oil

4. BROCCOLI OIL (BRASSICA OLERACEA ITALICA SEED OIL)

Broccoli Seed Oil offers a range of4.  fantastic benefits for your intimate skin. It contains arachidonic acid, which is an omega-6 fatty acid known to be beneficial for your intimate areas. This oil is also packed with essential fatty acids, making it great for your intimate skincare.

What's more, unlike some skincare ingredients like retinol, broccoli seed oil is gentle on your intimate skin while still fighting free radical damage and helping your intimate skin look smooth and youthful. It's also rich in vitamin E, which naturally soothes and protects your intimate skin from everyday environmental exposure.

One of the special things about broccoli seed oil is its mix of omega-9 and omega-6 fatty acids. These fatty acids are good for calming and nourishing your intimate skin, helping it stay soft, smooth, and healthy. So, when you use products with broccoli seed oil for your intimate skincare, you're giving it a healthy boost.

Find it in: Cleansing Oil

 

5. CHAMOMILE OIL (CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA FLOWER EXTRACT)

Chamomile extract is a sought-after ingredient in intimate care products, known for its soothing and anti-inflammatory properties. It excels in relieving discomfort, reducing redness, and addressing irritation in intimate areas. Whether the cause is friction, sensitivity, or other factors, chamomile's natural calming effects provide gentle and effective relief.

Additionally, chamomile extract is highly effective in alleviating itching, a common issue in various intimate skin conditions. Its mildness makes it an ideal choice for sensitive intimate skin, ensuring that even those with delicate skin can benefit from its therapeutic properties without worry. Overall, chamomile extract is a trusted ingredient, delivering comfort and well-being to intimate areas, making it a top choice in intimate care products.

Find it in: Calming Oil & Cleansing Oil

We developed our Intimate Shaving Trio to not only shave but also to prepare and take care of the skin post-shave.

settings.title: 1. Cleansing Oil
settings.text: Begin by prepping the skin with the Pre-Shave Oil, add it on in the shower, and do not wash it off. The Pre-Shave Oil protects the skin against the razor and softens the hair prior to shaving.

settings.title: 2. Calming Oil
settings.text: On top, add the Shaving Foam for the perfect glide. Shave with the grain (so up to down instead of down to up).
